readers.type: Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.DictionaryReader`2[[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]]

content.95/e 93/k 94/t 1800 1950/i 136/y 2: 50s/6 15/farmer 4 19 0 Sam 17 13 0 Jodi 7 4 0 Kent 3 15 1/removeItem 136/removeQuest 22/pause 300/faceDirection Kent 2/speak Kent "嗨 @。快進來吧。"/move farmer 0 -3 0/speed Jodi 4/move Jodi 0 10 2/speak Jodi "啊，你能來真是太好了， @！你還帶了魚來！棒極了！"/move farmer 2 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 1/faceDirection Kent 1/faceDirection Jodi 1/speak Jodi "山姆！你進來幫我收拾下魚好嗎？"/pause 300/speak Sam "……遵命。$a"/move Sam -5 0 3 true/proceedPosition Sam/stopAnimation farmer/doAction 12 14/move Sam 0 2 3 false/move Sam -4 0 3/faceDirection Jodi 2/pause 500/showFrame 35/addObject 7 15 136/playSound fishSlap/pause 800/stopAnimation farmer/speak Jodi "哇，看來很棒的樣子……聞起來也很新鮮呢！多謝你帶來的禮物啦， @。#$b#肯特也抓到一條魚，不過那個給他自己吃都不一定夠！$u"/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 1000/speak Kent "呵呵。$h"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "唔……這鱸魚真是脆！麵包屑也糊得恰到好處！"/pause 500/message "我現在感覺就像是家庭的一份子。"/pause 1500/end warpOut
content.94/e 93/k 95/t 1800 1950/i 136/y 1: 50s/6 15/farmer 4 19 0 Sam 17 13 0 Jodi 7 4 0/removeItem 136/removeQuest 22/speed Jodi 4/move Jodi 0 10 2/speak Jodi "啊，你好！ @！進來！這是魚的味道嗎？"/move farmer 0 -3 1/move farmer 2 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 1/faceDirection Jodi 1/speak Jodi "山姆！進來幫我準備一下晚餐好嗎？"/pause 300/speak Sam "……遵命。$a"/move Sam -5 0 3 true/proceedPosition Sam/stopAnimation farmer/doAction 12 14/move Sam 0 2 3 false/move Sam -4 0 3/faceDirection Jodi 2/pause 300/showFrame 35/addObject 7 15 136/playSound fishSlap/pause 800/stopAnimation farmer/pause 400/speak Jodi "哇，看起來質量絕佳的鱸魚呢， @。多謝你帶來的禮物啦。$h"/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "唔……這鱸魚真是脆！麵包屑也糊得十分完美！"/pause 500/message "我現在感覺就像是家庭的一份子。"/pause 1500/end warpOut
content.44/f Sam 500/p Sam: sampractice/-1000 -1000/farmer 4 15 1 Sam 17 16 2 Sebastian 18 18 0/positionOffset Sebastian 32 -31/skippable/animate Sam false true 200 20 21/showFrame Sebastian 41/viewport 17 16 true/move farmer 8 0 0/pause 500/doAction 12 14/move farmer 0 -2 1/move farmer 4 0 2/pause 9000/stopAnimation Sam/showFrame Sebastian 8/pause 1000/faceDirection Sam 0/pause 800/speak Sam "啊，你好 @!塞巴斯蒂安和我正“玩音樂”呢。"/move farmer 0 3 1/faceDirection Sam 3/faceDirection Sebastian 3/speak Sam "我們想組建一支樂隊，但是不知要搞哪種音樂才好。選擇實在太多了。"/pause 500/emote Sebastian 28/faceDirection Sam 2/pause 500/emote Sam 16/faceDirection Sam 3/speak Sam "#$q 76 null#說， @…… 你喜歡什麼樣的音樂？#$r 76 50 Event_band1#令人愉悅的流行樂。#$r 77 50 Event_band2#實驗性質的硬搖滾。#$r 78 50 Event_band3#極富能量的舞曲。#$r 79 50 Event_band4#氣氛活躍的鄉村音樂。"/move Sam 0 2 1/speak Sam "你說怎麼樣，塞巴斯蒂安？我們就搞這個？"/pause 300/faceDirection Sebastian 0/pause 300/faceDirection Sebastian 3/speak Sebastian "……好。"/pause 500/faceDirection Sam 0/move Sam 0 -2 3/speak Sam "多謝幫助， @。有了我高超的吉他技術和塞巴斯蒂安的電子琴能力。我們一定會成功的！絕對會！$h"/faceDirection Sam 2/speak Sam "只需要再找個打爵士鼓的就好了……$u"/pause 500/end
content.46/f Sam 1000/p Sam: playful/7 4/farmer 7 12 0 Sam 7 5 0 Jodi 17 7 0/skippable/move farmer 0 -6 0/faceDirection Sam 2/pause 300/speak Sam "啊，你好！ @。我正想吃點東西呢。"/pause 500/speak Sam "來，讓我給你拿點東西吃吧。"/faceDirection Sam 0/pause 500/playSound openBox/pause 500/faceDirection Sam 3/playSound dwop/specificTemporarySprite dropEgg/showFrame Sam 33/jump Sam/pause 1000/emote Sam 12/showFrame Sam 12/speak Sam "糟糕……真是一團亂。$s"/speed Jodi 4/move Jodi -10 0 0/speak Jodi "剛剛那是什麼聲音？"/emote Jodi 16/speak Jodi "*喘氣 *$s"/move Jodi -1 0 0/move Jodi 0 -1 0/speak Jodi "簡直太可怕了！發生了什麼事？$u"/speak Sam "$q 80 null#……告訴她吧， @。$s#$r 80 -10 event_snack1#山姆把零食遞給我的時候掉到了地上。#$r 80 50 event_snack2#山姆把零食遞給我的時候被我弄掉了。#$r 81 -50 event_snack3#山姆故意弄掉的。他覺得這樣很好玩。"/pause 300/speak Jodi "$p 80#謝謝你告訴我事實真相， @。不是什麼大事。|山姆，你做了什麼呀？！你這是犯什麼病了？！$u"/faceDirection Jodi 0/speak Sam "真是對不起，媽。我這就打掃乾淨。$s"/emote Jodi 20/speak Jodi "謝了，親愛的。$h"/move Jodi 0 1 1/move Jodi 1 0 2 /faceDirection Sam 2 true/move Jodi 0 7 2 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Sam "$p 81#你這樣我很生氣。不知你為什麼要這樣對我撒謊。$s|之前的事很抱歉。"
content.100/f Kent 750/p Kent/p Jodi: none/6 5/farmer 7 12 0 Jodi 5 5 0 Kent 7 16 2/skippable/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move farmer 0 -3 0/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move farmer 0 -2 0/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move farmer 0 -1 0/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move farmer 0 -1 3/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 200/faceDirection Jodi 1/speak Jodi "您好。@！我正在做爆米花呢。$h"/pause 50/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 79/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 100/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 26/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 39/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 50/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 110/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 59/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/speak Kent "啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！！$u"/faceDirection Jodi 2 true/faceDirection farmer 2 true/speed Kent 4/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move Kent 0 -1 0/speed Kent 4/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move Kent 0 -2 0/speed Kent 4/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move Kent 0 -1 0/speed Kent 4/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move Kent 0 -2 0/speed Kent 4/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move Kent 0 -1 0/speed Kent 4/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move Kent 0 -3 0/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 50/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 100/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 80/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/speak Kent "那聲音……$s"/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 70/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 100/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 180/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/emote Kent 12/faceDirection Kent 3/speak Kent "你知道這聲音會讓我想起戰爭的吧！$u"/pause 50/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 75/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/faceDirection Jodi 0/playSound openBox/pause 400/faceDirection Jodi 2/pause 500/playMusic desolate/faceDirection Kent 2/pause 800/showFrame Kent 16/pause 800/speak Kent "我有很多朋友都死在了那該死的戰壕裡。$s"/pause 800/emote Jodi 28/pause 500/speak Jodi "但是，親愛的……你走之前可是最愛吃的爆米花了。$s"/pause 500/showFrame Kent 0/pause 500/pause 800/speak Kent "……世事是會變的。"/pause 600/faceDirection Jodi 1/pause 400/move Jodi 1 0 1/speak Jodi "*低聲說* @……你能跟他說幾句嗎？$s"/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/faceDirection Kent 0/pause 300/speak Kent "$q 215 null#（跟肯特聊聊）$s#$r 215 -25 event_popcorn1#這事怪喬迪……她本該知道的！#$r 215 50 event_popcorn2#我知道你內心很痛苦……但這也不能怨你老婆啊。#$r 215 -50 event_popcorn3#（撒謊）這事怪我……是我說要吃爆米花的。"/pause 900/faceDirection Kent 2/pause 700/emote Kent 28/pause 600/speak Kent "……$s#$b#真抱歉，親愛的。我本該知道爆米花的聲音會讓你不安的。"/pause 700/move Jodi 0 1 1/speak Jodi "沒事，親愛的。$s#$b#我最不想看到的就是你不開心啦。我會竭盡全力讓你心情好起來的。"/pause 500/faceDirection Kent 3/pause 1000/end dialogue Kent "我們家有你這個朋友我很高興， @。我要為剛剛的行為道歉。"

content.rejectSam: pause 800/move farmer 0 3 2/faceDirection Sam 2/pause 800/showFrame Sam 37/emote Sam 28/speak Sam "我懂了……$s"/pause 800/faceDirection Sam 0/speak Sam "抱歉……是我搞錯了。待會見。$7"/move farmer 0 2 2/warp farmer -1000 -1000/playSound woodyStep/pause 1000/end dialogue Sam "……$s"
